name: Connect (Alfantin)
description:
For save world you have to hack nuclear bomb launcher  system and stop war.

This game made for "Extra Credits Game Jam."
I applied theme "Connect" as two way. 
First is connect data blocks and merge them with weapon. 
Second is connect to nuclear launcher computer as hacker.

NOTE: Video and cover image from v1.1 . It is ready waiting for jam voting finishe for upload.
